DOC.brief_summary: This study will examine the efficacy, safety, and effect on hemoglobin levels, of once weekly epoetin beta subcutaneous injections (30,000 International Units [IU]) in anemic patients with solid tumors. The anticipated study duration is 4 months, and the target sample size is 40 individuals.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Recormon (Epoetin Beta) in Anemic Patients With Non-Myeloid Malignancy
DOC.criteria: Adult patients with a nonmyeloid malignancy Anemia Transfusion of red blood cells within 2 months of study drug Treatmentresistant hypertension Acute or chronic bleeding (requiring therapy) within 3 months of study drug
